title: Enmitus: The Children
description: When Corinna leaves the barren planet of Serenitus and travels home, it is clear that war is imminent. She returns to her much loved husband Tacari with grave news. Tacariâ€™s father, Great Lord Zeal has been murdered, and his brother, Blayze is seriously wounded. Should their enemy Great Lord Michio recover from his injuries he will want revenge. The problems for the planet Enmitus have just begun. Princess Corinna will need all her strength and courage in the dark times ahead. There are battles to be fought, and children to look after in these perilous times. This is a story of love, hate, betrayal, danger and revenge.
author: Diane Major
